ul_role=\"tablist\":
The issue in the code snippet is that the ARIA role "tablist" is used on a `ul` element, but its required child role "tab" is missing on the list items (`li`). Here's the correct version of the code snippet: ```html
  • Tab 1
  • Tab 2
  • Tab 3
``` In this corrected snippet, the list items (`li`) have been given the required child role "tab".
